sentences.sContent: The text builds up tension,and you hear this read out loud, and it keeps building up this tension, but then the seventh seal is such a anticlimax: silence in heaven for a half an hour.
sentences.sContent_eng: The text builds up tension,and you hear this read out loud, and it keeps building up this tension, but then the seventh seal is such a anticlimax: silence in heaven for a half an hour.
sentences.sCn: 这本书营造出紧张感，人们听到它被大声朗读出来，而且它还持续营造紧张感，到了第七印，却一点高潮都没有：,“天上寂静约有二刻
